original_title: NTB’s ‘We Transfer More Than Money’  initiative rewards lucky remittance customers
original_body_lines: Nations Trust Bank’s ‘We Transfer More Than Money’ initiative to boost inward remittances into Sri Lanka, has rewarded Nations Remittance customers from across the country for the month of April this year.

To reflect the Bank’s commitment to increasing remittances to the country’s economy while enhancing connections between Sri Lankans and their loved ones abroad, Nations Trust Bank is rewarding valuable supermarket gift vouchers to their Nations Remittance customers. By prioritising a robust remittance service under the tagline, ‘We Transfer More Than Money’, the Bank provides a reliable and efficient platform for remittances.

In order to qualify to win these vouchers, for every remittance transaction with a minimum value of Rs. 50,000/- or its equivalent in foreign currency, customers automatically receive entry into the prize draw for supermarket gift vouchers. The Bank’s initiative has garnered large participation and engagement from around the country.
